title: I Don't Want to Burden My Husband
description:
Amy's husband is fighting stage 4 cancer and says she's overwhelmed but doesn't want to burden him with her chaotic thoughts. - Dr. Laura: "Lean on your friends when necessary and on your husband when possible so he knows he's still your man."

Have you and your spouse struggled with illness? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura

Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
